name: Spellbind Tactics
description: Strategy and planning are the keys when playing Spellbind Tactics, each character has certain set of movements that when used properly can lead to a powerful game plan, each one of the characters are designed to support each other in order to achieve powerful synergies and movements that will leave your opponent shocked, the effectiveness with which you plan these strategies and your ability to react to the movements of your adversary will be decisive in order to achieve victory.
